data.name: supplyReport.ReportResourceString
data.value:
﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Report ScriptLanguage="CSharp" ReportInfo.Created="05/26/2018 17:56:51" ReportInfo.Modified="05/29/2018 23:04:33" ReportInfo.CreatorVersion="2018.3.10.0"> <Dictionary> <OdbcDataConnection Name="Connection" ConnectionString="rijcmlqDsfwzqmpop0DqfGfr49Br1BEBRTg6bCmgJFsVfVGp0qFPEObhd3hT7IFAJw4XsqVYmk56fnGKrcLO+UpGfNk7yovZ1WDCE4n41hnLNhwI3xLUrvE3v/J1jbsuR1Q15L9"> <TableDataSource Name="Table" Alias="Supply" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 categorygoods.CategoryGoodsName,
 goodsmanufacturer.GoodsManufacturerName,
 goodscatalog.GoodsName,
 supplystructure.GoodsAmount,
 goodscatalog.GoodsCost,
 supplystructure.SupplyID
FROM supplystructure
 INNER JOIN goodscatalog
 ON supplystructure.GoodsID = goodscatalog.GoodsID
 INNER JOIN categorygoods
 ON goodscatalog.CategoryGoodsID = categorygoods.CategoryGoodsID
 INNER JOIN goodsmanufacturer
 ON goodscatalog.GoodsManufacturerID = goodsmanufacturer.GoodsManufacturerID"> <Column Name="CategoryGoodsName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="GoodsManufacturerName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="GoodsName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="GoodsAmount" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="GoodsCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> <Column Name="SupplyID" DataType="System.Int32"/> </TableDataSource> </OdbcDataConnection> <Parameter Name="TotalGoodsCost" DataType="System.Decimal" Expression="[Supply.GoodsAmount]*[Supply.GoodsCost]"/> <Parameter Name="SupplyID" DataType="System.Int32" Expression="3"/> <Total Name="TotalCost" Expression="[TotalGoodsCost]" Evaluator="Data1"/> <Total Name="TotalAmount" Expression="[Supply.GoodsAmount]" Evaluator="Data1"/> </Dictionary> <ReportPage Name="Page1"> <ReportTitleBand Name="ReportTitle1" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text1" Left="226.8" Top="9.45" Width="255.15" Height="28.35" Text="Состав поставки" HorzAlign="Center" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 20pt, style=Bold"/> </ReportTitleBand> <PageHeaderBand Name="PageHeader1" Top="50.45" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text6" Top="9.45" Width="718.2" Height="28.35" Fill.Color="DarkGray" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 12pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text2" Top="9.45" Width="463.05" Height="28.35" Text="НАИМЕНОВАНИЕ" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text3" Left="538.65" Top="9.45" Width="85.05" Height="28.35" Text="КОЛ-ВО" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text4" Left="623.7" Top="9.45" Width="94.5" Height="28.35" Text="СУММА" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text11" Left="463.05" Top="9.45" Width="75.6" Height="28.35" Text="ЦЕНА" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> </PageHeaderBand> <GroupHeaderBand Name="GroupHeader1" Top="100.9" Width="718.2" Height="37.8" Condition="[Supply.CategoryGoodsName]"> <TextObject Name="Text5" Top="9.45" Width="718.2" Height="18.9" Fill.Color="LightGray" Text="[[Supply.CategoryGoodsName]]" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 12pt, style=Bold"/> <DataBand Name="Data1" Top="141.9" Width="718.2" Height="37.8" DataSource="Table" Filter="[Supply.SupplyID] == [SupplyID]"> <TextObject Name="Text7" Top="9.45" Width="217.35" Height="18.9" Text="[Supply.GoodsManufacturerName]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text8" Left="217.35" Top="9.45" Width="245.7" Height="18.9" Text="[Supply.GoodsName]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text9" Left="538.65" Top="9.45" Width="85.05" Height="18.9" Text="[Supply.GoodsAmount]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text10" Left="623.7" Top="9.45" Width="94.5" Height="18.9" Text="[TotalGoodsCost]" Format="Currency" Format.UseLocale="true" HorzAlign="Right" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text12" Left="463.05" Top="9.45" Width="75.6" Height="18.9" Text="[Supply.GoodsCost]" Format="Currency" Format.UseLocale="true" HorzAlign="Right" VertAlign="Center" WordWrap="false" Trimming="EllipsisCharacter"/> </DataBand> <GroupFooterBand Name="GroupFooter1" Top="182.9" Width="718.2" Height="9.45"/> </GroupHeaderBand> <ColumnFooterBand Name="ColumnFooter1" Top="195.55" Width="614.25" Height="18.9" Text="Товаров в поставке:" HorzAlign="Right" Font="Arial, 12pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text15" Left="614.25" Top="9.45" Width="103.95" Height="18.9" Text="[TotalCost]" Format="Currency" Format.UseLocale="true" HorzAlign="Right" Font="Arial, 12pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text16" Left="614.25" Top="37.8" Width="103.95" Height="18.9" Text="[TotalAmount]" Font="Arial, 12pt, style=Bold"/> </ColumnFooterBand> <PageFooterBand Name="PageFooter1" Top="264.9" Width="718.2" Height="9.45"/> </ReportPage> </Report>
